item.text: Now as they approached Jerusalem, near Bethphage and Bethany, at the Mount of Olives, Jesus sent two of his disciples

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5217">Go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2968" class="">village</st> <st data-num="2713" class="">ahead</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2117">As soon as</st> you <st data-num="1531" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, you will <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> a <st data-num="4454" class="">colt</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">tied</st> there <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> has <st data-num="3768">never</st> been <st data-num="2523" class="">ridden</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3089" class="">Untie</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5342" class="">bring</st> it here.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="3004">says</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, ‘<st data-num="5101">Why</st> are you <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this?’</st> <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘The <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">needs</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="649" class="">send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">back</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> <st data-num="2117" class="">soon.’</st>”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> a <st data-num="4454" class="">colt</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">tied</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">at</st> a <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st>, <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="296" class="">street</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3089" class="">untied</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="5100">Some people</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> are you <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st>, <st data-num="3089" class="">untying</st> that <st data-num="4454" class="">colt</st>?”

They <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st> <st data-num="2531" class="">as</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> had <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the bystanders<n id="1" /> <st data-num="863" class="">let</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> go.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="5342" class="">brought</st> the <st data-num="4454" class="">colt</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="1911" class="">threw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloaks</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1911">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2523" class="">sat</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="4183" class="">Many</st> <st data-num="4766" class="">spread</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloaks</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> <st data-num="4766" class="">spread</st> <st data-num="4746" class="">branches</st> they had <st data-num="2875" class="">cut</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="68" class="">fields</st>.
Both those who went ahead and those who followed kept shouting, “Hosanna! Blessed is the one who comes in the name of the Lord!

<st data-num="2127" class="">Blessed</st> is the <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>! <st data-num="5614" class="">Hosanna</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5310" class="">highest</st>!”
Then Jesus entered Jerusalem and went to the temple. And after looking around at everything, he went out to Bethany with the Twelve since it was already late.
Now the next day, as they went out from Bethany, he was hungry.

After <st data-num="1492" class="">noticing</st> <st data-num="575" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3113" class="">distance</st> a <st data-num="4808" class="">fig tree</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5444" class="">leaves</st>, he <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> to see <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> he could <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="5100">any</st> fruit<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>. When he <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> he <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="1508">but</st> <st data-num="5444" class="">leaves</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="2540" class="">season</st> for <st data-num="4810" class="">figs</st>.
He said to it, “May no one ever eat fruit from you again.” And his disciples heard it.

Then they came to Jerusalem. Jesus entered the temple area and began to drive out those who were selling and buying in the temple courts. He turned over the tables of the money changers and the chairs of those selling doves,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he would <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="863" class="">permit</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> to <st data-num="1308" class="">carry</st> <st data-num="4632" class="">merchandise</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>.<n id="2" />
Then he began to teach them and said, “Is it not written: ‘My house will be called a house of prayer for all nations’? But you have turned it into a den of robbers!”

The <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> it, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="2212" class="">considered</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> they could <st data-num="622" class="">assassinate</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> they <st data-num="5399" class="">feared</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> was <st data-num="1605" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st>.
When evening came, Jesus and his disciples went out of the city.
In the morning as they passed by, they saw the fig tree withered from the roots.

<st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="363" class="">remembered</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4461">Rabbi</st>, <st data-num="1492" class="">look</st>! The <st data-num="4808" class="">fig tree</st> you <st data-num="2672" class="">cursed</st> has <st data-num="3583" class="">withered</st>.”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="2192">Have</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> in <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> if <st data-num="3739" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="3004">says</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">mountain</st>, ‘Be <st data-num="142">lifted up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="906" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea,’</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1252" class="">doubt</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> he <st data-num="2980" class="">says</st> will <st data-num="1096" class="">happen</st>, it will <st data-num="1510">be done</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778">this reason</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3745">whatever</st> you <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="154">ask for</st>, <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you have <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> it, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> it will <st data-num="1510">be</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">yours</st>.
Whenever you stand praying, if you have anything against anyone, forgive him, so that your Father in heaven will also forgive you your sins.”
They came again to Jerusalem. While Jesus was walking in the temple courts, the chief priests, the experts in the law, and the elders came up to him

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="1722">By</st> <st data-num="4169" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st><n id="1" /> are you <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st>? <st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “I will <st data-num="1905" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">question</st>. <st data-num="611" class="">Answer</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I will <st data-num="3004">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4169" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> I <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st>:

<st data-num="2491">John’s</st> <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st>—<st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> it <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">Answer</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”

They <st data-num="1260" class="">discussed</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1438">one another</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1437">If</st> we <st data-num="2046" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1537">From</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven,’</st> he will <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1223">Then</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> did you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him?’</st>

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> if we <st data-num="2036" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1537">From</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>…’” (they <st data-num="5399" class="">feared</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> they <st data-num="537" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">considered</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3689" class="">truly</st> a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet)</st>.
So they answered Jesus, “We don’t know.” Then Jesus said to them, “Neither will I tell you by what authority I am doing these things.”
